The golemverse is a collection of R packages for building `{shiny}` apps that need to be safely shipped to production.

<!-- Install them all with:

```r
install.packages("golemverse")
``` -->

### Packages from the golemverse

- `{bank}`, `r utils::packageDescription("bank")[["Title"]]`

- `{brochure}`, `r utils::packageDescription("brochure")[["Title"]]`

- `{dockerfiler}`, `r utils::packageDescription("dockerfiler")[["Title"]]`

- `{elvis}`, `r utils::packageDescription("elvis")[["Title"]]`

- `{fakir}`, `r utils::packageDescription("fakir")[["Title"]]`

- `{gargoyle}`, `r utils::packageDescription("gargoyle")[["Title"]]`

- `{gemstones}`, `r utils::packageDescription("gemstones")[["Title"]]`

- `{golem}`, `r utils::packageDescription("gemstones")[["Title"]]`

- `{ghooks}`, `r utils::packageDescription("ghooks")[["Title"]]`

- `{skeleton}`, `r utils::packageDescription("skeleton")[["Title"]]`

- `{shinidraw}`, `r utils::packageDescription("shinidraw")[["Title"]]`

- `{shinipsum}`, `r utils::packageDescription("shinipsum")[["Title"]]`
